# Apple Pay on the Web Version 12 Release Notes

**Article**

The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 12 and iOS 15.

## Overview

New features include:

- Added the properties [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier/total], [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier/additionalLineItems], and [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier/additionalShippingMethods] to [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayModifier] to support the W3C Payment Request API.
- Added [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayShippingMethod/dateComponentsRange] to [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayShippingMethod] to provide estimated arrival dates for shipping methods.
- Added [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayRequest/supportsCouponCode] and [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayRequest/couponCode] to [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayRequest] to support the W3C Payment Request API.
- Created [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayCouponCodeDetails] to encapsulate the information within [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/PaymentMethodChangeEvent/methodDetails] from [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/PaymentMethodChangeEvent].
- Created [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayCouponCodeChangedEvent].
- Added [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/completeCouponCodeChange] to [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/ApplePaySession].
- Created [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayCouponCodeUpdate].
- Added [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayRequest/shippingContactEditingMode] to [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayRequest] to support the W3C Payment Request API which allows you to define whether a user can edit a shipping address.
- Added [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest/supportsCouponCode], [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest/couponCode], and [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest/shippingContactEditingMode] to [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayPaymentRequest].

## Apple Pay Version

- **Apple Pay on the Web Version 14 Release Notes**: The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 13 and iOS 16.
- **Apple Pay on the Web Version 13 Release Notes**: The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 12.3 and iOS 15.4.
- **Apple Pay on the Web Version 11 Release Notes**: The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 11.5 and iOS 14.5.
- **Apple Pay on the Web Version 10 Release Notes**: The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 11 and iOS 14.
- **Apple Pay on the Web Version 9 Release Notes**: The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 10.15.6 and iOS 13.6.
- **Apple Pay on the Web Version 8 Release Notes**: The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 10.15.1 and iOS 13.2.
- **Apple Pay on the Web Version 7 Release Notes**: The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 10.14.6 and iOS 12.4.
- **Apple Pay on the Web Version 6 Release Notes**: The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 10.14.4 and iOS 12.2.
- **Apple Pay on the Web Version 5 Release Notes**: The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 10.14.2 and iOS 12.1.1.
- **Apple Pay on the Web Version 4 Release Notes**: The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 10.14.1 and iOS 12.1.
- **Apple Pay on the Web Version 3 Release Notes**: The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 10.13 and iOS 11.
- **Apple Pay on the Web Version 2 Release Notes**: The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 10.12.1 and iOS 10.1.
- **Apple Pay on the Web Version 1 Release Notes**: The version of Apple Pay available in macOS 10.12 and iOS 10.
